name: In which number the fractional part is greater
instruction:
Write a function `compareFractionalParts`.

The function accepts two numbers and returns the number with the fractional part greater.

If the fractional parts are equal, the first number is returned.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript.
compareFractionalParts(1.10, 1.2) // 1.2
compareFractionalParts(1.2, 1.1) // 1.2
compareFractionalParts(2.1, 1.1) // 2.1
compareFractionalParts(10.1, 2.3) // 2.3
```
